short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate the season with Anime Christmas! This Chrome extension fills your new tab with festive anime scenes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the holiday season with Anime Christmas! This Chrome extension fills your new tab with festive anime scenes that bring holiday cheer to your browsing.

The Anime Christmas live wallpaper extension combines cozy holiday visuals with beloved anime-style art, creating a warm and vibrant setting for every new tab. With its holiday charm and functional tools, itâ€™s designed to brighten up your browsing experience.

Enjoy seamless searches with a Google search bar, access your favorite sites with customizable shortcuts, and keep track of time with a clock-date display.

Key Features:
Live Wallpaper featuring festive Anime Christmas scenes
Google Search Bar for quick browsing
Customizable site shortcuts for easy access
Clock-Date display for staying on schedule

Celebrate the season in style with Anime Christmas! Find more themed wallpapers at Gameograf.com to personalize your new tab.

Related Keywords: Anime Christmas, holiday anime, festive themes, winter wonderland, holiday wallpapers, Live Wallpaper
